original_text:
But they had a wanton craving in the wilderness,
    and put God to the test in the desert;
korean_text: 광야에서 욕심을 크게 내며 사막에서 하나님을 시험하였도다

sentences.original_text: But they had a wanton craving in the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 광야에서 악한 욕망을 품었습니다

sentences.original_text: and put God to the test in the desert
